7.Pros: The best part about working is that I get to see my kids and husband smile as I take care of the house and provide for us all as much as possible.
7.Cons: The downside of working is that I never get to spend enough family time especially on the weekends and on Sunday when it's time to go to church. Never get to be off holidays.
